channel.title: EXE on AmunRha's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in EXE on AmunRha's Blog

item.title: BlueLock | Windows Malware | bi0sCTF 2022
item.description: tl;dr Implemented two SEH and two VEH Exception Handlers Two stage malware challenge with process injection technique CPP binary where logic is wrapped in classes and their member functions Challenge points: 1000

item.title: Confirmation of Identity | HTB Finals 2021
item.description: Description I wrote this advanced program to only work on my computer but I think I might have made a mistake somewhere, as I can’t even confirm my own identity.
